meanings.definition: Having a circular or spiral form
meanings.sent1: The rotiform pattern on the rug was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The rotiform clouds in the sky looked beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The rotiform cake decoration made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her rotiform dance moves captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The rotiform whirlpool sucked everything in its path.

meanings.definition: To take on a circular or spiral shape
meanings.sent1: The dough will rotiform as it rises.
meanings.sent2: The tornado began to rotiform in the distance.
meanings.sent3: I tried to rotiform my hair into a perfect bun.
meanings.sent4: The story started to rotiform into a thrilling mystery.
meanings.sent5: The sandcastle began to rotiform into a majestic tower.

meanings.definition: A design or pattern characterized by circular or spiral shapes
meanings.sent1: The artist created a rotiform using different colors.
meanings.sent2: The rug had a beautiful rotiform woven into it.
meanings.sent3: The rotiform on the dress made it stand out.
